name: Shipwright Quarter (North Dock)

culture_adjustments: Guild hierarchy overrides clan patronage in labor allocation
Shipbuilding songs encode practical construction knowledge
Routine integration of augury rites into launch and repair

constraints: Limited adoption of high-pressure steam industry

notes: Critical node in state maritime logistics
